short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds current page URL and Title to Tags4info app

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension used to integrate Google Chrome browser and Tags4info hierarchical tagging application. App can be downloaded from official site provided here. When you click on extension button current page URL and Title send to running application and can be stored with hierarchical tags.
